bioconda.name: bioconductor-kegglincs
bioconda.summary: Visualize all edges within a KEGG pathway and overlay LINCS data

biotools.summary: See what is going on 'under the hood' of KEGG pathways by explicitly re-creating the pathway maps from information obtained from KGML files.

bioschemas.name: KEGGlincs
bioschemas.summary: See what is going on 'under the hood' of KEGG pathways by explicitly re-creating the pathway maps from information obtained from KGML files.
